explains: v. 包含；把……列为一部分，把……算入（include 的现在分词形式）

sentences.en: He was fully dressed, including shoes.
sentences.cn: 他已穿戴好了，包括鞋子。

sentences.en: Anyone can sew on a button, including you.
sentences.cn: 任何人都能缝钮扣，包括你。

sentences.en: He admitted seven charges including forging passports.
sentences.cn: 他承认了包括伪造护照在内的7项罪名。
